EmailTemplate.subject: [Copado] Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}: "{!Case.Subject}" has been created.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Copado Support Thanks for contacting Copado support. Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}: "{!Case.Subject}" has been created. Issue definition: {!Case.Description_Rich__c} Communication: Copado support will review your case but bear in mind that we cannot guarantee a response time or resolution for Academy cases.
In the meantime, we encourage you to Ask a Question or visit the Collaboration Groups at the Copado Success Community.
You can visit our documentation site, where you will find useful information about Copado.
If you have questions related to our Certification Program, check out the Certification Guides for more information.
Copado Solutions will never ask for your account password. For your own privacy and security NEVER send your credentials by email.
Thank you. Copado Support Team
Case tracking Id: {!Case.Thread_Id} Copado Solutions S.L.
